pages.text: The $(thing)Isentropic Reservoir$() is an augment that increases the amount of Redstone Flux a $(l:mods_thermalexpansion/magmatic_dynamo)Magmatic Dynamo$() generates by making it consume coolant as well as fuel.

pages.title: Mechanic
pages.text: An installed $(thing)Isentropic Reservoir$() increases the amount of RF per unit of lava by +15% and quadruples power output. Coolant works the same way as it does in a $(l:mods_thermalexpansion/compression_dynamo)Compression Dynamo$(): better coolants will produce more energy per unit of fuel, equals to the $(thing)coolant factor$() of the coolant minus 20%. This means that $(item)Water$() has no bonus, $(item)Gelid Cryotheum$() has a bonus of +40% and $(item)Crushed Ice$() has a +20% bonus.
The $(thing)Isentropic Reservoir$() is compatible with other non-specialization augments, making it possible to increase energy output even more.
